ovdesc.p: This is a system generated table that defines routing products to be used in product determination process in the payments hub

desc.p: Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
Date and Time when the record was approved in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
User ID of the record approver
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Describes the Routing product in free text.
Date and Time when the record was created in DD MON 2015 HH:MM:SS.MMM format
User ID of the record creator
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Possible values:
N - Not active
A - Active
H - History
F - Future
C - Not active future
Specifies the name of the routing product to be used across the payments hub.
